amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds to be used as salaries of othotists and prosthetists who are not certified by a nationally accredited body.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to be used as salaries of othotists and prosthetists who are not certified by a nationally accredited body.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stivers amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stivers amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Stivers.
